description:
I don't know if this is a great idea to be doing but I feel like there's a lot of sense-making going on and I want to orient it correctly. Also, I'll say, Twitter isn't just a bastion of weirdo rightwing takes, it's a bastion of weirdo takes. The algorithmic aspect has done the exact thing you might imagine with a powerful tool under a careless leader, which is that it does a great job of surfacing the worst takes.

title: The Worst (And BEST!) Election Takes I've Seen So Far
